text: Scientific American began publication with the issue for this day. It would become the oldest continuously published magazine in the United States.

The crew of the Space Shuttle Atlantis sent an electronic mail message using AppleLink. The message read: "Hello Earth! Greetings from the STS-43 Crew. This is the first Applelink from space. Having a GREAT time, wish you were here!"
Apple released Mac OS X 10.6 Snow Leopard featuring many minor improvements and integration with Microsoft Exchange.
